posts.post_content:
Happy New Year everyone!

After the Christmas rush, I've finally gotten a chance to sit down and relax and think about cards again!

I really want to knock this card off my want list this year, so here we go.

I'm looking to buy or trade for a T206 Christy Mathewson portrait, well centered, in anything from a PSA 3 to a PSA 6.

Please PM or email me at [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url] if you've got one you're looking to move or would consider letting go of in the right deal.

Looking forward to a great year of collecting, let me know!
anybody selling?  don't pay the fee at the auction house just to have me bid on it there.  save yourself the time, trouble and get a few extra bucks in your pocket!
